mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.product_id AS "product.id", a.product_amount AS "productAmount", a.repository_no AS "repositoryNo", a.in_time AS "inTime", a.state AS "state", a.vm_id AS "vendingMachine.id", a.user_id AS "user.id", product.name AS "product.name", vendingMachine.name AS "vendingMachine.name", user.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN t_product product ON product.id = a.product_id LEFT JOIN t_vending_machine vendingMachine ON vendingMachine.id = a.vm_id LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_put( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, product_id, product_amount, repository_no, in_time, state, vm_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{product.id}, #{productAmount}, #{repositoryNo}, #{inTime}, #{state}, #{vendingMachine.id}, #{user.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product_put SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, product_id = #{product.id}, product_amount = #{productAmount}, repository_no = #{repositoryNo}, in_time = #{inTime}, state = #{state}, vm_id = #{vendingMachine.id}, user_id = #{user.id} WHERE id = #{id}
